DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine effect food supplement strength training appetite , amount energy expend , body composition .
DOC.brief_title: The Body 's Response Food Intake Trained , Older Adults
DOC.criteria: All subject must meet following eligibility criterion : Age range : 60 year old Body mass index 2029 kg/m2 Weight stable ( < 2 kg weight change within last 6 month ) Nonsmoking Constant habitual activity pattern within last 3 month Clinically normal blood profile ( specifically , normal liver kidney function ; normal complete blood count ( nonanemic ) ; fast blood glucose < 110 mg/dl ) Not take medication know influence appetite metabolism Nondiabetic Confirmation acceptability eat study test food ( solids fluid ) Trained subject ( Recruiting 36 ; N25 ) must meet following eligibility criterion : Resistive exercise training ( ≥ 2 time week ) base report physical activity level ( questionnaire ) Active fitness level ( ≥ 2 , 30minute aerobic exercise sessions/week ) Sedentary subject ( Recruiting 36 ; N25 ) must meet following eligibility criterion : Resistive exercise training ( ≤ 1 time week ) base report physical activity level ( questionnaire ) Active fitness level ( ≤ 2 , 30minute aerobic exercise sessions/week ) All subject exclude base follow exclusionary criterion : Age : < 60 year Body mass index : outside 2029 kg/m2 range Gained lose > 4.5 kg within last 6 month Smoker ( currently within last year ) Intermittently involve diet and/or exercise program within last 3 month Clinically abnormal blood profile identify study physician , Arthur Rosen , MD Taking medication ( currently within last 3 month ) know influence appetite metabolism Abnormal heart function ( interpreted cardiologist ) assess ( study exclusion ) study physician , Arthur Rosen , MD Clinically diagnose diabetic Study food find unacceptable consumption subject Clinically diagnose osteoporosis Trained subject exclude base follow exclusionary criterion : Did perform resistive exercise training ( currently within last 3 month ) base report physical activity level ( questionnaire ) Perform ≤ 1 , 30minute aerobic exercise session/week ( currently within last 3 month ) base physical activity level questionnaire ) Sedentary subject exclude base follow exclusionary criterion : Performed resistive exercise training ( currently within last 3 month ) base report physical activity level ( questionnaire ) Perform > 2 , 30minute aerobic exercise sessions/week ( currently within last 3 month ) base physical activity level questionnaire )
